outputs.name: modifier
outputs.description:
A translucent modifier that can be assigned to a Honeybee geometry
or Modifier Sets.

inputs.name: _name
inputs.description:
Text to set the name for the modifier and to be incorporated into
a unique modifier identifier.

inputs.name: _diff_ref
inputs.description:
A number between 0 and 1 for the opaque diffuse reflectance.
This reflectance will be the same for the red, green and blue channels.

inputs.name: _diff_trans
inputs.description:
A number between 0 and 1 for the transmitted diffuse component.
This is the fraction of transmitted light that is diffusely scattered.

inputs.name: _spec_trans
inputs.description:
A number between 0 and 1 for the transmitted specular component.
This is the fraction of transmitted light that is not diffusely
scattered but passes through like a beam.

inputs.name: _spec_
inputs.description:
A number between 0 and 1 for the fraction of specularity. Specularity
fractions greater than 0.1 are not common in non-metallic materials (Default: 0).

inputs.name: _rough_
inputs.description:
Roughness is specified as the rms slope of surface facets. A value
of 0 corresponds to a perfectly smooth surface, and a value of 1 would be
a very rough surface. Roughness values greater than 0.2 are not very
realistic. (Default: 0).

code:
try:  # import the core honeybee dependencies
    from honeybee.typing import clean_and_id_rad_string
except ImportError as e:
    raise ImportError('\nFailed to import honeybee:\n\t{}'.format(e))

try:  # import the honeybee-radiance dependencies
    from honeybee_radiance.modifier.material import Trans
except ImportError as e:
    raise ImportError('\nFailed to import honeybee_radiance:\n\t{}'.format(e))

try:  # import ladybug_{{cad}} dependencies
    from ladybug_{{cad}}.{{plugin}} import all_required_inputs
except ImportError as e:
    raise ImportError('\nFailed to import ladybug_{{cad}}:\n\t{}'.format(e))


if all_required_inputs(ghenv.Component):
    # set the default modifier properties
    _spec_ = 0.0 if _spec_ is None else _spec_
    _rough_ = 0.0 if _rough_ is None else _rough_

    # create the modifier
    modifier = Trans.from_single_reflectance(
        clean_and_id_rad_string(_name), _diff_ref, _spec_, _rough_,
        _diff_trans, _spec_trans)
    modifier.display_name = _name
name: HB Translucent Modifier
description:
Create a translucent radiance modifier from a reflectances and transmittances.
-
